app_description.message: Refresh web pages automatically. Auto-refresh and page monitor with specified time intervals.

show_notification_title.message: Notify when text will found on the page

show_notification_title_not_text.message: Notify when text will NOT found on the page

show_notification_title_element.message: Notify when element will found on the page

show_notification_title_not_element.message: Notify when element will NOT found on the page

show_notification_description.message: A notification will display when a keyword or regex is found in the page

show_notification_description_not_found.message: A notification will display when a keyword or regex is NOT found in the page

clicker_description.message: Click Find icon or use jquery format or document.querySelector(...). Examples: #myId, .myClass, a[href='/myPage'], document.querySelector('#myId')

clicker_modal_description.message: Select an element on the webpage to auto-click

run_script_description.message: Each time the page is refreshed, the script you entered will run. If the "All frames" option is selected, the script will run in embed elements (example, in  <iframe> tags, etc)

url_list_description.message: URLs from the list will be opened and refreshed in the current tab

specific_time_title.message: Enter one time per line (example, 13:40 or 2:30pm)

specific_time_description.message: Refresh at a specific time. Use 12 or 24-hour format: 5:30pm or 06:30 or 21:40

parent_reason_message.message: If you would like to use the extension options on this page, please stop the ":reason" feature on the refresh page or use the stop button below

parent_reason_description.message: After clicking the "Stop" button, the webpages with refresh process were started earlier will continue to refresh

find_text_on_page_notification_not.message: The keyword ":keyword" was NOT found in ":title"

not_allow_find_text_on_page_notification.message: Text search isn't available on this page

clicker_update_selector_notification.message: The element ":selector" is selected, return to the extension window to continue working

not_allow_select_selector_notification.message: You cannot select an element on this page. Use another website.

stop_all_notification.message: Automatic page refreshing has started in some browser tabs. Stop auto page refreshing?

promo_description.message: If you value our free product, please consider to become a Patron or giving a donation. Get recipes and solutions to automate your job!

without_reload_description.message: Website data is reloaded without refreshing the page. This allows the page to reload without stopping you from viewing the content.

page_monitor_notification.message: There are some changes on the ":title" page.

page_monitor_description.message: Auto Refresh Page will notify you when any change occurs on this webpage

longer_countdown_description.message: A countdown counter, which is displayed in the extensions panel at the top right of the browser, next to the extension icon.
